benak.tomas.crimemonitor.client.view

Class CrimesOverviewPieChart

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • benak.tomas.crimemonitor.client.view.CrimesOverviewPieChart

  • public class CrimesOverviewPieChart
extends View
    A class used to draw a pie chart of crimes.

    The pie chart is rendered as a series of pie slices. Each pie slice is drawn using the information from a particular crime toplist item.

    Author:
    Tom
    See Also:
    CrimeToplistItem

    • Method Detail

      • init

        private void init()
        Initializes the view to be able to measure and draw itself.

      • onDraw

        protected void onDraw(Canvas canvas)
        Draws the pie chart.

        For each crime toplist item a pie slice is drawn. The size of each slice is in proportion to the crime count of the crime toplist item. The color of each slice is taken from the crime toplist item.

      • onMeasure

        protected void onMeasure(int widthMeasureSpec,
             int heightMeasureSpec)
        Measures the dimensions of this view.

        The smaller of the dimension values is used for both the width and height.

      • onSizeChanged

        protected void onSizeChanged(int w,
                 int h,
                 int oldw,
                 int oldh)
        Calculates the bounding rectangle of the pie chart.

      • setCrimeItems

        public final void setCrimeItems(CrimeToplistItem[] crimeItems)
        Sets the crime toplist items collection to be rendered in the pie chart.

        The collection is stored and the view is invalidated and possibly redrawn.

        Parameters:
        crimeItems - the collection of crime toplist items to render the pie chart for
